Reviews.Title: FAST SHIPPING
Reviews.Author: FTCSSSW
Reviews.Content: CAMERA WAS WHITE, NOT BLACK LIKE THE PICTURE.  ALSO, ITS A BABY CAM, NOT JUST A CAMERA (IT HAS A THERMOMETOR, AND IT PLAYS LULABYS IF WANTED.  IT MUST ORIGANALLY HAVE BEEN FOR SOME OTHER SYSTEM, AND THE UDR RECIEVER HAS NO WHERE FOR THE TEMP TO BE DISPLAYED.  OTHER THAN THAT, IT WAS AS EXPECTED.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Scott A. valenti
Reviews.Content: picture is great...the mobilitity with it makes it nice to go from room to room to watch different areas at different times of day
